column1: Kata Robata////1. They are so busy
column2: the food does not come in the correct order. They just bring you whatever is easier to get
column3: which usually means the rolls before the sushi or sashimi. The spicy food comes out before the not spicy and you may get the hot food anywhere in between. It is not possible to taste and enjoy some of the delicate dishes if they do not come in the correct order. If you go there for dinner
column4: order your food what step at a time.
